Your kids will have an amazing summer while they immerse themselves in everything pet-related during our one week camp experience!

Campers will meet a variety of our ambassador animals from the PetSpace Critter Corner and learn how to be responsible pet owners to these unique creatures.

CANCELLATION POLICY

For cancellations made at least 14 days prior to the first day of camp, a 100% refund will be issued.

Cancellations made less than 14 days prior to the first day of camp will receive a 50% refund.

one_time_events.summary: ğŸµOzomatli Concert
one_time_events.location: Burton Chace Park, 13650 Mindanao Way, Marina Del Rey, CA 90292, USA
one_time_events.description:
BEST FOR:Â Family

Now in its 25th year, Marina del Rey Summer Concert Series returns with exciting symphonic and pop concerts at beautiful Burton Chace Park.

TIME:Â Performances start at 7:00 p.m.

VENUE:Â Burton Chace Park - 13650 Mindanao Way, Marina del Rey, CA 90292

Event Details

What to Expect:

  • Alternating pop and symphony concerts, featuring acclaimed artists and the Marina del Rey Symphony.
  • Gourmet food trucks arrive at 5:00 p.m., or pack your own picnic for a classic concert-in-the-park experience.
  • Family-friendly, relaxed atmosphere-perfect for all ages.
  • No reserved seating; arrive early for the best spots.

Where to EatÂ Â 

Marina del Rey offers a wide variety of restaurants with many types of cuisine and price ranges to choose from. For a full list of dining options, go to theÂ Marina del Rey Restaurant Map.

If youâ€™d rather bring your own food, you can enjoy a picnic or barbecue at Burton Chace Park, which offers a limited number of public picnic tables and grills available on a first-come, first-served basis.

Getting There, Parking & Accessibility

Due to the popularity of the Summer Concert Series , expect heavy traffic delays on the roads surrounding the Marina del Rey area.

  • Public parking lots nearby the park; rates typically $7â€“$10.
  • The Marina del ReyÂ WaterBusÂ and Beach Shuttle offer convenient, scenic access on concert nights.
  • The park and shuttles are wheelchair accessible.

Public Transportation:
Take the LA Metro'sÂ C LineÂ (formerly Green Line) to the Marina del Rey Station and catch the Culver City Bus #1 to the Marina.

Accessibility:
Burton Chace Park is accessible, with wheelchair-friendly pathways, viewing areas, and restroom facilities. Accessible parking spaces are available in all public lots.

Rideshare:Â For safety, rideshare drivers shouldÂ notÂ stop or park illegally to pick up or drop off passengers.Â Plan ahead and be ready to walk a short distance to or from your rideshare spot.

Insider Tips

  • Arrive Early: The parking lots fill up quickly, so arriving early ensures youâ€™ll find a spot and enjoy the sunset views, sample local eats, and soak up the festive community vibe before the music begins.
  • Seating:Â Bring your own low-back chair or cozy blanket to ensure comfortable seating during the concert. Burton Chace Park offers open lawn areas with no reserved seats, so arriving early with your own seating helps you claim the best spotÂ 
  • Ride theÂ Summer WaterBusÂ for $1 per person: Before the concert, hop onÂ the Summer WaterBus for just $1 per person. This open-air boat stops at eight scenic locations throughout the marina-including Burton Chace Park-so you can enjoy a relaxing harbor cruise before the concert begins.
